postBootScript:
#!/bin/bash
yum install -y wget
 wget  http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/pos/pos_mobius_start.sh -O /root/mobius_start_up.sh
 sh /root/mobius_start_up.sh WORKFLOW all
wget  http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/pos/panorama-data.sh -O /root/master.sh
 sh /root/master.sh
